title: Proposal: Sudoswap Partnership
body:
Hello, I’m Owen, the developer behind 0xmons.xyz and sudoswap.xyz. I’d like to put forward a proposal for a partnership between sudoswap and MOCA. Sudoswap is a non-custodial trading platform that allows users to swap any bundle of NFTs + ERC20 tokens, peer to peer. It’s completely free and powered by the 0x Protocol. 

I’m excited to continue building out features for sudoswap to help the NFT community and provide a secure trading experience. I’m asking for a developer grant to continue building out sudoswap for both the broader NFT community as well as deepening relationships with MOCA.

The main features on the near-term roadmap I’ll be building out are:

- An improved UI to showcase the asset being offered for trade (e.g. images of assets, verified contracts, etc.)

- Public orders to allow for a more order-book like model (e.g. allowing trades to be made visible, open to everyone)

- Adding multi-chain EVM (e.g. BSC, Polygon) support

In addition, I would also like to help MOCA with further development where possible, e.g. peer reviewing smart contracts for the platform. 

As a first step for the partnership, I am proposing building out a sudoswap rebrand that is MOCA focused with the same functionality and zero fees. The grant would be for 1,000 MOCA tokens streamed over the course of this quarter.
author: 0x75d4bdBf6593ed463e9625694272a0FF9a6D346F
